Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 4
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty IV; sheet 3; Hieratic literary text verso and recto. Late Egyptian Miscellanies. Recto 5 (leading edge on Sheet 2)-7 (first part); Verso 6-7. Recto: Monotheistic Hymns Verso: A Student's Miscellany
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner. Hieratic Papyri, Vol. 1 28-44, Vol. 2. Plate 14, Recto 5 (leading edge on Sheet 2)-6; Plates 15 & 15A, Recto 7 (first part); Plates 20 & 20A, Verso 6. Plate 21, Verso 7. The verso of this manuscript is available om T.L.A. (http://aaew.bbaw.de/tla/)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381089) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381089)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, fragmentary, fragile, bleached Black ink Red ink Tabbed: silk Displayed in Room 62 until 1997 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alfred Chester Beatty
Donated by: Lady Edith Chester Beatty
